description: This course explores the sources and nature of public power and the regulation of that power through the concepts of legitimacy (representative democracy), accountability (responsible government), and enforcement (judicial review).
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24)
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
